identity.name: MICROSOFT CORP
identity.description: Microsoft Corporation is a global technology company that develops, licenses, and supports a wide range of software products, services, and devices. It is best known for its Windows operating system, Office productivity suite, and Azure cloud services.

competitors.name: Apple Inc.
competitors.description: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets consumer electronics, software, and services. It is known for its innovative products like the iPhone, iPad, and Mac computers.
competitors.advantages: Strong brand loyalty, integrated ecosystem of products and services, and a focus on user experience.

competitors.name: Google LLC
competitors.description: Google LLC is a multinational technology company specializing in Internet-related services and products, including search engines, online advertising, cloud computing, and software.
competitors.advantages: Dominance in search and online advertising, extensive data analytics capabilities, and strong cloud services.

competitors.name: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
competitors.description: Amazon Web Services is a subsidiary of Amazon providing on-demand cloud computing platforms and APIs to individuals, companies, and governments on a metered pay-as-you-go basis.
competitors.advantages: Market leader in cloud services, extensive service offerings, and strong infrastructure.

competitors.name: IBM Corporation
competitors.description: IBM is a multinational technology and consulting company that offers a wide range of products and services, including cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and enterprise solutions.
competitors.advantages: Strong legacy in enterprise solutions, extensive research and development capabilities, and a focus on hybrid cloud.

competitors.name: Salesforce.com, Inc.
competitors.description: Salesforce is a cloud-based software company that provides customer relationship management (CRM) services and applications focused on sales and customer service.
competitors.advantages: Leading CRM platform, strong customer engagement tools, and extensive integration capabilities.
